text: HKA may refer to: * HKA test, of molecular evolution * Blytheville Municipal Airport, in Arkansas, United States * Henryka Beyer (1782–1855), German painter * Hip-knee-ankle angle in orthopedics * Hong Kong Academy * Hong Kong Attitude, a professional esports organization * Hong Kong Airlines, founded 2006 * Hong Kong Airways, active 1947–1959 * Kahe language * Superior Aviation, an American airline
title: HKA
